info.tagline: I can help you achieve your goal as a web developer.
info.about: I'm a web developer with experience in Asp.net Core / Mvc, Angular and WordPress. I’m currently working on Fiverr and Upwork as a freelancer in web development. I have a good understanding of Web Development with Asp.net MVC/Core, Angular and Wordpress. I’ve performed tasks related to theme integration in Angular, Asp.net MVC, WordPress and API Integration in Angular and Asp.net/Core.

testimonials.name: Osama
testimonials.review: Excellent developer. Met my requirements and is very helpful! will work with him on another project for sure! He's very brave and patience! keep up your good work!.

testimonials.review: Excellent, fast, very competent and knowledgeable, very polite - highly recommended.

testimonials.review: Seller was prompt in his response and listened to all Buyer's requirements and carried out his responsibilities well.

testimonials.review: Seller was very responsible and completed his task within the timeline given. Would highly recommend the Seller for a good WordPress development project.

testimonials.review: Awesome to work with. Great responsiveness and understanding of what was required. He provided me the best solutions and recommendations for my project.
